name_en: Glasgow Outcome Scale - Extended (GOSE)
History
Any event
Tree
Date of injury
Age at injury
Interval post-injury
Consciousness

name_nb: 1. Er personen med hodeskade i stand til å respondere på enkel instruksjon
name_en: eller si noen ord?
column8: 1. Is the head injured person able to obey simple commands

name_en: Independence in the home

name_nb: 2a Kreves det personhjelp til daglige aktiviteter i hjemmet hver dag?
name_en: 2a Is the assistance of another person at home essential every day for some activities of daily living?

name_nb: 2b Trenger han/hun ofte hjelp eller tilsyn i hjemmet?
name_en: 2b Do they need frequent help or someone to be around at home most of the time?

name_nb: 2c Var det helt nødvendig med personhjelp i daglige aktiviteter i hjemmet før skaden?
name_en: 2c Was the assistance at home essential before the injury?
Independence outside the home

name_nb: 3a Kan han/hun gjøre innkjøp uten hjelp?
name_en: 3a Are they able to shop without assistance?

name_nb: 3b Kunne han/hun gjøre innkjøp uten hjelp før skaden?
name_en: 3b Were they able to shop without assistance before the injury?

name_nb: 4a Kan han/hun reise lokalt uten hjelp?
name_en: 4a Are they able to travel locally without assistance?

name_nb: 4b Kunne han/hun reise lokalt uten hjelp før skaden?
name_en: 4b Were they able to travel without assistance before the injury?
Work

name_nb: 5a Er han/hun for tiden i stand til å arbeide med samme kapasitet som tidligere?
name_en: 5a Are they currently able to work to their previous capacity?
5b How restricted are they?

name_nb: 5c Var han/hun i arbeid eller arbeidssøkende før skaden (svar "ja") eller ingen av delene (svar "nei")?
name_en: 5c Were they either working or seeking employment before the injury (answer 'yes') or were they doing neither (answer 'no')?
Social & leisure activities

name_nb: 6a Kan han/hun gjenoppta regelmessige sosiale aktiviteter og fritidsaktiviteter utenfor hjemmet?
name_en: 6a Are they able to resume regular social and leisure activities outside home?

name_nb: 6b Hvor omfattende er begrensningene i sosiale aktiviteter og fritidsaktiviteter (utenfor hjemmet)?
name_en: 6b What is the extent of restricition on their social and leisure activities?

name_nb: 6c Deltok han/hun jevnlig i sosiale aktiviteter og fritidsaktiviteter utenfor hjemmet før skaden?
name_en: 6c Did they engage in regular social and leisure activities outside home before the injury?
Family & friendships

name_nb: 7a Har det vært psykologiske problemer som har resultert i pågående belastninger eller splid i vennskap eller familieforhold?
name_en: 7a Have there been psychological problems which have resulted in ongoing family disruption or disruption to friendships?

name_nb: 7b Hva har vært omfanget av disse problemene?
name_en: 7b What has been the extent of disruption or strain?

name_nb: 7c Var det problemer i forhold til familie eller venner før skaden?
name_en: 7c Were there problems with family or friends before the injury?
Return to normal life

name_nb: 8a Er det andre aktuelle problemer relatert til skaden som påvirker dagliglivet?
name_en: 8a Are there any other current problems relating to the injury which affect daily life?

name_nb: 8b Var de tilsvarende problemene tilstede også før skaden?
name_en: 8b Were similar problems present before the injury?
Category
Respondent
har personen med hodeskade hatt noen epileptiske anfall?
column8: Since the injury has the head injured person had any epileptic fits?

name_nb: Har han/hun blitt fortalt at han/hun for tiden har risiko for å utvikle epilepsi?
name_en: Have they been told that they are currently at risk of developing epilepsy?
What is the most important factor in outcome?
